name: Aislin's Story: The Bloodbath Trials
description:
Welcome to the Bloodbath... This is an "Ethan Must Die-like" Level, designed to help tide people over until Aislin's Story is finished.

This game is HARD and you will die and restart A LOT. So take your time and listen. It's completely do-able however, we made sure of that!
Playtime should be around 45 minutes - 1 hour (If you're lucky)

Our main game "Aislin's Story" can be found here: https://owlneststudios.itch.io/aislins-story
